attributes.action: Object to governments financial restrictions which risk lives
attributes.additional_details:
I was disgusted that a child had died by being refused admission to a local hospital due to political protocols.
See story at http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-stoke-staffordshire-18899708 - I'm sure this is not the first.
This situation has arisen because of regulations and financial clampdowns created by this government and it should be highlighted as who's to blame for these deaths.
